alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Gosper; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 9:28PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Phelps, northwestern Kearney, western Buffalo, northeastern Gosper and Dawson Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 927 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Eddyville to Smithfield to near Holbrook. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bertrand and Eddyville around 935 PM CDT. Sumner around 940 PM CDT. Miller around 945 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Pleasanton. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 225 and 275. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central and central Nebraska.
